title: Were 10,000 camels to be killed in Australia in the midst of water shortages?
subtitle: Multiple websites and social media regretted the population control strategy announced by the South Australian authorities in the midst of drought and extreme heat in January 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2020, South Australian officials announced a plan to close some 10,000 brutal sentences in response to public safety and environmental resource concerns.
